meanings.definition: A person who specializes in escaping from confinement or restraints, especially as a form of entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The escapologist amazed the audience with his daring escape from the locked box.
meanings.sent2: The famous escapologist performed a thrilling act at the circus last night.
meanings.sent3: The escapologist's pet cat seemed to be better at escaping from the house than he was!
meanings.sent4: Watching the escapologist break free from the chains was like witnessing a magician's trick.
meanings.sent5: The escapologist's ability to free himself from any trap was truly remarkable.
